    • Uses of Literal in org.semanticweb.rulewerk.core.model.api

      Classes in org.semanticweb.rulewerk.core.model.api with type parameters of type Literal 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Conjunction<T extends Literal>
      Interface for representing conjunctions of Literals, i.e., lists of (negated or positive) atomic formulas that are connected with logical AND.
      Subinterfaces of Literal in org.semanticweb.rulewerk.core.model.api 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Fact
      A fact is a positive (non-negated) literal that contains only constants as its terms, but no variables.
      interface  NegativeLiteral 
      interface  PositiveLiteral 
      Methods in org.semanticweb.rulewerk.core.model.api that return types with arguments of type Literal 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Conjunction<Literal> Rule.getBody()
      Returns the conjunction of body literals (the premise of the rule).
